title: Luxury Living near Downtown -  Dedicated EV charging - Washer/Dryer
posting_body: Luxury Living near Downtown -  Dedicated EV charging - Washer/Dryer in Unit - MUST SEE!
Fully Renovated, beautifully crafted 2BD/1BA apartment situated in a private, safe and upscale residential neighborhood walking distance to Downtown Mountain View.
Unique living experience you must see to appreciate.

Comes with all the conveniences of modern living including in-house CAT-5 cabling to all rooms, double pane windows, can lighting, forced air furnaces, fully tiled shower stalls and designer-inspired kitchens with stainless steel appliances including gas range, dishwasher, fridge & garbage disposal.
Engineered hardwood floors and lushly carpeted bedrooms, in-apartment washer/dryer unit.

This unique complex is situated in a tranquil community setting overlooking scenic Stevens Creek with over 2 acres of land, which includes private gardens for each apartment, bocce court, BBQ areas and peaceful walkways.
Adjacent to the Stevens Creek pathway which leads to Google and West to Cupertino.
The location is only a 10-minute walk to the Mountain View Caltrain Station.
Pet-Friendly (with additional deposit & monthly fee) - 1 garage parking space included with Level 2 EV Charging Station available
Nearby parks include Sylvan Park, Slater School Park and Pioneer Park.
Nearby schools include Edith Landels Elementary School, St Stephen Lutheran School and Western Montessori Day School.
Tenant pays for their own metered gas & electricity.
